description: Quintessential NYC Apartment located in the Upper East Side. This studio is steps from Central Park, shopping on Madison Ave, & surrounded by the city's top restaurants and bars. The apartment is in excellent condition. The kitchen has a brand new stove top (never been used), full fridge and furnished with all glassware & cooking supplies. The apartment is facing the interior building so noise is never an issue. There is a dresser & closet available for you along with clean linens & towels.
name: Studio Apartment Available in Upper East Side!
